title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; identical API surface to the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, embedder, and retriever components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file upload, multi-user, dark mode) packaged as a Docker container.

title: ollama-hack
summary: Experimental Emacs interface that lets you chat with Ollama models inside any buffer.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (Rust) for interactive Ollama chats with syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama into a local GitHub Copilot replacement with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React/Electron desktop app for chatting with Ollama models; supports Markdown and code blocks.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing synchronous, reactive, and streaming APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or plain Ruby apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async I/O and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a containerized service for CI pipelines and dev workflows.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Next.js chatbot template that uses Ollama for fully local inference; no API keys needed.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using your local Ollama instance; supports slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app bringing Ollama completions into channels/DMs with optional admin approval flows.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for generating and refining notes using local Ollama models without cloud costs.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray example showing how to scale Ollama inference across a cluster with Ray Serve and autoscaling.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfile recipes for fine-tuned and custom GGUF models ready to import.
